moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nc3 Nf6 3. Bc4 d5 4. d3:
Russ. It's your move here.
 PxB is the correct move.
moves.4... Nc6 5. exd5 Na5 6. Bb5+ c6 7. Ba4 B:
Your move.   8... PxP is correct move here
If white then takes back 9.BxP, then 9....NxB. and you gain another piece.
moves.8... b5 9. Nxb5 Rb8 10. Bb3: 10. Bb3 mistake by white. This leaves his Bishop unprotected.
moves.10... Bb4+: 10....Bb4+  Mistake by black. Black should play 10....RxN, winning the Knight.
moves.12. Bxb4 Nxb4 13. Nf3 Bg4 14. Nc3 Nxd3+: 14. Mistake here giving away your knight.
